block.p: AVISTA CORP., Spokane, Wash., a utility owner in the Pacific Northwest, said it hired Merrill Lynch & Co. to help it consider alternatives for Avista Labs, its fuel cell unit, including an initial public offering.

TLC LASER EYE CENTERS INC., Ontario, Canada, an eye care company, said its eyeVantage.com unit had agreed to acquire Oregon Optometric Group Provider, one of the largest buyers and distributors of eye care products in the United States. Financial terms were not disclosed.

AVISTA CORP., Spokane, Wash., a utility owner in the Pacific Northwest, said it hired Merrill Lynch & Co. to help it consider alternatives for Avista Labs, its fuel cell unit, including an initial public offering.

TLC LASER EYE CENTERS INC., Ontario, Canada, an eye care company, said its eyeVantage.com unit had agreed to acquire Oregon Optometric Group Provider, one of the largest buyers and distributors of eye care products in the United States. Financial terms were not disclosed.
KEITHLEY INSTRUMENTS INC., Cleveland, a maker of electrical measurement systems, said it would split its stock two shares for one on June 1 to shareholders of record as of May 18.
